00042 #ifndef MyDecayPhysics_h
00043 #define MyDecayPhysics_h 1
00044 
00045 #include "myglobals.hh"
00046 #include "G4VPhysicsConstructor.hh"
00047 
00048 #include "G4Decay.hh"
00049 
00050 class MyDecayPhysics : public G4VPhysicsConstructor
00051 {
00052   public: 
00053     MyDecayPhysics(G4int ver = 1);
00054     MyDecayPhysics(const G4String& name, G4int ver = 1);
00055     virtual ~MyDecayPhysics();
00056 
00057   public: 
00058     // This method will be invoked in the Construct() method. 
00059     // each particle type will be instantiated
00060   virtual void ConstructParticle();
00061  
00062     // This method will be invoked in the Construct() method.
00063     // each physics process will be instantiated and
00064     // registered to the process manager of each particle type 
00065   virtual void ConstructProcess();
00066 
00067   virtual G4Decay* GetDecayProcess() { return fDecayProcess; }
00068 
00069 private:
00070   G4Decay* fDecayProcess;
00071   G4int    verbose;
00072   G4bool   wasActivated;
00073 };
00074 
00075 #endif
